dct_title_s: Mare del Sud detto altrimenti Mare Pacifico. Auttore Il P.M. Coronelli M.C. Cosmografo della Serenissima Republica di Venetia
dct_description_sm: California as an island of the Blaeu 1648 type, and with no interior features.
Dedication: "dedicato All'Ill.mo et Ecc.mo Signor, Il Signor Cavalier Giulio Giustinian Sauio Grande".
Title cartouche in upper right on shell with supporting nereids and fruits of the sea below. "America Settentrionale" above cartouche.
Shows route of Jacques LeMaire, 1615-1617. Fifty degrees separate Japan from the California coast.
Wagner 436; Tooley 58; Leighly 90 (plate XV), Tooley/Australia P48#350.
